scripts.dev:edge: bun build server/app.ts --outdir supabase/functions/api --watch & watchexec --restart -w supabase/functions/api -- supabase functions serve
scripts.publish:server:edge: supabase db push && supabase config push && supabase functions deploy
scripts.publish:server:do: doctl apps create-deployment $(doctl apps list --format ID --no-header)
scripts.deploy:client: bun run build:client && bun run publish:client
scripts.deploy:server:edge: bun run build:edge && bun run publish:server:edge
scripts.build: bun run build:client && bun run build:edge
scripts.publish: bun run publish:client && bun run publish:server:edge
scripts.deploy: bun run build && bun run publish
